rows.label: qst201109_0010
rows.name: Mikumari. So you came.

rows.label: qst201109_0020
rows.name: That's me, in the flesh.

rows.label: qst201109_0030
rows.name:
I'll admit, I was a little curious about you.
Just a little.

rows.label: qst201109_0040
rows.name: *sigh* I can tell you're not the same...

rows.label: qst201109_0050
rows.name:
It was naive to think
you'd remember.

rows.label: qst201109_0060
rows.name:
Even after I showed you the antique
lance you liked...

rows.label: qst201109_0070
rows.name:
Even after I took you to places we'd
been before...

rows.label: qst201109_0080
rows.name:
None of it jogged your memory.
It's like you're a blank slate.

rows.label: qst201109_0090
rows.name:
You seem pretty invested in me getting
my memories back, huh.

rows.label: qst201109_0100
rows.name: But why would you go this far?

rows.label: qst201109_0110
rows.name:
I just...wanted for us to be together again.
As a team.

rows.label: qst201109_0120
rows.name: I wished for nothing more.

rows.label: qst201109_0130
rows.name: But...

rows.label: qst201109_0140
rows.name:
But back in Superbia, I realized
that could never be.

rows.label: qst201109_0150
rows.name: This is my last resort!

rows.label: qst201109_0160
rows.name:
Well played, Seori. Looks like you're gonna
get your wish after all.

rows.label: qst201109_0170
rows.name: You?!

rows.label: qst201109_0180
rows.name: The Core Crystal hunter...

rows.label: qst201109_0190
rows.name:
Been a while, eh? Glad to see you
remembered me.

rows.label: qst201109_0200
rows.name: A lot's happened since.

rows.label: qst201109_0210
rows.name:
Mikumari's Driver was killed and most
of my squad got taken in.

rows.label: qst201109_0220
rows.name:
Not a day's gone by that I haven't been
thinking about you lot.

rows.label: qst201109_0230
rows.name: Look at my Seori.

rows.label: qst201109_0240
rows.name:
Look at what you've done to her. She's
nothing more than a coward now.

rows.label: qst201109_0250
rows.name:
She's nothing without Mikumari. So I'm
gonna have to ask you to hand her over.

rows.label: qst201109_0260
rows.name: Excuse me? Who d'you think you are?

rows.label: qst201109_0270
rows.name:
You can't do a thing without your
Blades to protect you, can you?

rows.label: qst201109_0280
rows.name:
If you think I'm siding with some thugs,
you've got another thing coming!

rows.label: qst201109_0290
rows.name:
Ohh, now that's not very nice, is it?
Calling your old pal Seori a thug?

rows.label: qst201109_0300
rows.name:
I guess that's how you end up once you
belong to a feeble Driver like that.

rows.label: qst201109_0310
rows.name:
You saw what's become of her,
Seori.

rows.label: qst201109_0320
rows.name:
You really want to leave her like that?
Like a half-broken toy?

rows.label: qst201109_0330
rows.name: Of course I don't.

rows.label: qst201109_0340
rows.name: I will kill her Driver. And I will get her back.

rows.label: qst201109_0350
rows.name: Wait...so you're going to fight Mikumari?

rows.label: qst201109_0360
rows.name:
No. I will take out all of you,
so that Mikumari can be free!

rows.label: qst201109_0370
rows.name: What have you done to her?

rows.label: qst201109_0380
rows.name:
Hahahah... I resent the accusatory tone.
All I did was tell her the truth.

rows.label: qst201109_0390
rows.name: If she wants Mikumari back...

rows.label: qst201109_0400
rows.name:
she just has to kill you all, get ahold of
Mikumari's Core Crystal...

rows.label: qst201109_0410
rows.name: and then...let me reawaken her!

rows.label: qst201109_0420
rows.name: Cut the crap! Blades aren't your slaves!

rows.label: qst201109_0430
rows.name: It's wrong to exploit them like this!

rows.label: qst201109_0440
rows.name: Shut your trap, kid!

rows.label: qst201109_0450
rows.name:
Life ain't a bunch of roses. That's
not how the world works!

rows.label: qst201109_0460
rows.name:
Besides, you've taken plenty of Blades
for yourself, haven't you?

rows.label: qst201109_0470
rows.name: Mikumari's proof of that!

rows.label: qst201109_0480
rows.name:
We aren't resonating with them for
the same reasons as you!

rows.label: qst201109_0490
rows.name: Get them, Seori! Take 'em all out!

rows.label: qst201109_0500
rows.name: Stop!

rows.label: qst201109_0510
rows.name: Mikumari?!

rows.label: qst201109_0520
rows.name: Give it up...

rows.label: qst201109_0530
rows.name: This is the only way for us to be together again!

rows.label: qst201109_0540
rows.name:
So please, do as you're told!
It won't be long till you're free again!
